CustomField.description: Checked if Call Recording Applet which first turns on Call Recording starts the recording without waiting for the two parties to be connected. Use Workflow (on create+update) to set this flag for Calls which don't defer CR Start based on the NVM Service
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if Call Recording Applet which first turns on Call Recording starts the recording without waiting for the two parties to be connected. Use Workflow (on create+update) to set this flag for Calls which don't defer CR Start based on the NVM Service
CustomField.label: CR Start Immediate
